body: Oh but those errors are only because you use the templates before you declare them. Make sure you instantiate them explicitly before you include the generic header.
body_html: Oh but those errors are only because you use the templates before you declare them. Make sure you instantiate them explicitly before you include the generic header.
body_text: Oh but those errors are only because you use the templates before you declare them. Make sure you instantiate them explicitly before you include the generic header.
